subject: Junit and CORBA IDL
msgSnippet: Greetings, Is anyone have an idea of using junit to test CORBA IDL? I think The TestSuite just accept *.class file, since CORBA IDL is specification, how can I
messageBody:
Greetings,


Is anyone have an idea of using junit to test CORBA IDL? I think The
TestSuite just accept *.class file, since CORBA IDL is specification,
how can I use Junit to test IDL? Someone help me out!




Yjin
